title: Join our Mailing List
desc: JOIN OUR MAILING LIST   ? If you would like to receive news from the CUNY Dominican Studies Institute and invitations to its academic and cultural programming, please complete the registration form above.  Although not required,?please tell us if you graduated from a college or university in the United States. It would also be very helpful to us if you would tell us if you are of Dominican descent.  Thank you for your interest and support of the CUNY Dominican Studies Institute.  ? Visit?CUNY Dominican Studies Institute Web Site
